title: WHAT. MY GOD. permabanned? WHAT? post my logs NOW
body:
I am absolutely ... i cant believe...

is there a billing error or something?



the most toxic thing i typed was maybe "dude please can we play better. whats going on. can we please try to win. stop dying and feeding guys please"

something small like that, MAYBE 1 out of every 10 games. so if i play 100 ranked games, maybe 10 have something like that



for real. im thinking this is a billing error?


everyone. PLEASE BUMP AND UPVOTE

i swear to god. im not toxic

ive NEVER been chat restricted or banned

this is my first ban. and its perma
